identity.philosophy: Fusion of High-End Art Gallery & Cyberpunk Security. We don't build 'marketplaces'; we build 'Digital Vaults'.
principles: Fusion: Renaissance Art meets Blockchain Terminal.
Emotion: The feeling of holding a rare asset.
Depth: Use z-index and glassmorphism to create a sense of security and layers.
Darkness: A gallery is dark so the art can shine.

heading_font.name: Playfair Display
heading_font.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Art Titles

mono_font.name: JetBrains Mono
mono_font.usage: License IDs, Prices, Transaction Hashes, Security Logs

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest font-bold text-xs px-8 py-3 transition-all hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,240,255,0.3)]
buttons.secondary: border border-border bg-transparent hover:bg-white/5 text-foreground rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest text-xs px-8 py-3

cards.interactive: group relative overflow-hidden border border-white/5 bg-white/[0.02] hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-500

inputs.style: bg-black/20 border-white/10 focus:border-primary/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 rounded-none h-12 font-mono text-sm

navigation.style: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-white/5

textures: Noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on all solid backgrounds

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts imports to index.css immediately.
3. TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors and fonts defined above.
4. COMPONENTS: When using Shadcn, override the 'rounded-md' with 'rounded-none' or 'rounded-sm' to match the sharp, technical aesthetic.
5. LAYOUT: Do not use standard containers. Use full-width sections with internal max-w constraints.
6. SECURE VIEWER: This is the core feature. It must look like a 'Vault'. Use dark backgrounds, mono fonts for metadata, and disable right-click via JS.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided URLs for placeholders. Do not use generic placeholders.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no centered text blocks without purpose.
Dark Mode First: Design for dark mode primarily. Light mode is secondary.
Micro-interactions: Every button must have a hover state. Every page load must have a stagger animation.
Data-TestID: All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
